author_id.description: The unique identifier of the author of the post.

closed.description: Indicates whether the post is closed or open for further comments.

comment_count.description: The total number of comments on the post.

content_tag_ids.description: Array containing unique identifiers of tags associated with the post.

details.description: Additional details or content of the post.

featured.description: Indicates whether the post is featured or not.

follower_count.description: The number of users following the post for updates.

frozen.description: Indicates whether the post content is frozen or editable.

html_url.description: The URL that directs to the HTML version of the post.

id.description: The unique identifier of the post.

non_author_editor_id.description: The unique identifier of a user who is not the author but edited the post.

non_author_updated_at.description: The date and time when a non-author user last updated the post.

pinned.description: Indicates if the post is pinned to stay on top of the list.

status.description: The current status of the post, such as 'open', 'solved', 'archived', etc.

title.description: The title or headline of the post.

topic_id.description: The identifier of the topic under which the post belongs.

vote_count.description: The total count of votes the post has received.

vote_sum.description: The sum of all votes received considering both upvotes and downvotes.

created_at.description: The date and time when the post was created.

url.description: The URL that points to the post details.

description.description: A brief summary or overview of the post content.

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last update made to the post.
